txt.en: You spot a small home, and smell a cooking fire
You now know that more refugees from Byre Tor have scattered westward towards Balewood, and should climb to high ground to look for them.

'Must you go look for them? I was hoping you could stay here...though you did me such kindness to make these women my friends at last!

'Nay, I see that you must search for survivors, and help them as you have helped us. We will stay here and survive until it is safe to come out again....

'I hope we meet again, [placeholder]! I have lost so much since Byre Tor was taken, but gained so much too.'
'I saw you below, stranger, and wondered if you would venture this way.'
Climb the high peak to the west to look for survivors
A high peak with a view of the Balewood can be found west of the refugees' cave.\n\nYou should climb the peak and search for the refugees.
Talk to the man on the peak
A man stands near his home, looking southward.\n\nYou should speak with the man atop the western-most peak.
